div.md:
Medicine for the
stomach
which heats it and unstops the
liver
div.ab:
Take
Take
wormwood
powder
, dissolve it in
capilli veneris
syrup
or
preserves
, & make with it an opiate of which you will take
once a week
on a
host soaked in wine
. Then you will be able to drink a
finger
of
sufficiently tempered wine
. This
dissipates the phlegm & the winds which arise from it
. You can take six
pepper
grains
& grate their rinds such that they are smooth, & swallow them without chewing. This
benefits the
stomach
without heating the
liver
.
